mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_PWD AS memberPwd, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, NICK_NAME AS nickName, PROMISE AS promise, AGE AS age, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, ADDRESS AS address, HOBBY AS hobby, INTEREST AS interest, MEMBER_STATE AS memberState, MEMBER_GRADE AS memberGrade, AD_AGREE AS adAgree FROM MEMBERTB WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd}
